marklogic.body:
The game needed more development time. It needed to switch to that "sandbox" once L50 was hit. The biggest complaint in beta, early-access, and now has been the game is on rails... and once L50 is hit, the rails are gone and the game does with most trains do when they're Off the rails... it crashes and Burns...
Presently, I have alternate characters I play on, But my L50 is waiting on the sidelines because I'm not crazy about PvP and the daily missions that do not require PvP become monotonous after awhile.
But, I'm a Star Wars fan, not an MMO player. So I'll keep my subscription until another (better) Star Wars MMO comes out... (Star Wars: Galaxies 2?) :)
